languages.text: "После того, что случилось на офицерском мостике — как ты переносишь варп-перелеты?"
"After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"
languages.original_text: "После того, что случилось на офицерском мостике — как ты переносишь варп-перелеты?"

traits.locale_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"
"After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"
"After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"
"After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

languages.text: «Después de lo sucedido en el puente de oficiales, ¿cómo estás llevando los cruces de la disformidad?».
languages.original_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

traits.locale_text: «Después de lo sucedido en el puente de oficiales, ¿cómo estás llevando los cruces de la disformidad?».

languages.text: “军官舰桥发生了那件事情之后，你是怎么应对亚空间穿越的？”
languages.original_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

traits.locale_text: “军官舰桥发生了那件事情之后，你是怎么应对亚空间穿越的？”

languages.text: 「士官ブリッジであのようなことがあったが、その後、ワープを渡る際にどう対処しているんだ？」
languages.original_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

traits.locale_text: 「士官ブリッジであのようなことがあったが、その後、ワープを渡る際にどう対処しているんだ？」

languages.text: « Comment vous accommodez-vous de nos passages dans le Warp, après ce qui s'est passé sur le pont des officiers ? »
languages.original_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment vous accommodez-vous de nos passages dans le Warp, après ce qui s'est passé sur le pont des officiers ? »

languages.text: "Wie kommt Ihr nach den Geschehnissen auf der Offiziersbrücke mit den Warpreisen zurecht?"
languages.original_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

traits.locale_text: "Wie kommt Ihr nach den Geschehnissen auf der Offiziersbrücke mit den Warpreisen zurecht?"

languages.text: "Subay köprüsünde olanlardan sonra öteboyut geçişleriyle nasıl başa çıkıyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "After what happened on the officers' bridge, how are you coping with the warp crossings?"

traits.locale_text: "Subay köprüsünde olanlardan sonra öteboyut geçişleriyle nasıl başa çıkıyorsun?"
